_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Spinosaurus Package
author: servers@gameservershub.com
description:
Path Of Titans Egg by GameServersHub
GameServersHub.com

installation.script:
#! /bin/bash
#
clear
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

echo -e "${BLUE}######################################################################################${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                    #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                           ${YELLOW}Starting Installation...${BLUE}                                 #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                    #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                   ${RED}(c) Copyright 2022 - GameServersHub.com${BLUE}                          #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                    #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                         ${YELLOW}Path Of Titans Install Script${BLUE}                              #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                         ${YELLOW}Egg by GameServersHub - 411guy${BLUE}                             #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                    #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}######################################################################################${NC}"
sleep 3

cd /mnt/server

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing prerequisites. Please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
sleep 1

apt -qq update
apt -qq install -y wget curl tar

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Downloading AlderonGamesCmd and installing${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Path of Titans. Please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
sleep 3

wget -O AlderonGamesCmd https://launcher-cdn.alderongames.com/AlderonGamesCmd-Linux-x64
chmod +x AlderonGamesCmd

export DOTNET_SYSTEM_GLOBALIZATION_INVARIANT=1
./AlderonGamesCmd --game path-of-titans --server true --auth-token $AG_AUTH_TOKEN --beta-branch $BETA_BRANCH --install-dir .

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Creating folders. Please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
sleep 2

mkdir -p /mnt/server/PathOfTitans
mkdir -p /mnt/server/PathOfTitans/Saved
mkdir -p /mnt/server/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config
mkdir -p /mnt/server/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Engine
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/Linux
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/Linux/CrashReportClient

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Downloading startup script and default config files. Please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
sleep 2

wget -O /mnt/server/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MxLNinjaz/GSH-POT/main/Game.ini >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O /mnt/server/.pteroignore https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MxLNinjaz/GSH-POT/main/.pteroignore >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O /mnt/server/PathOfTitans/Saved/MOTD.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MxLNinjaz/GSH-POT/main/MOTD.txt >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O /mnt/server/PathOfTitans/Saved/Rules.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MxLNinjaz/GSH-POT/main/Rules.txt >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O /mnt/server/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Commands.ini https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MxLNinjaz/GSH-POT/main/Commands.ini >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O /mnt/server/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/GameUserSettings.ini https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MxLNinjaz/GSH-POT/main/GameUserSettings.ini >/dev/null 2>&1

# Set game binary as executable
chmod +x ./PathOfTitans/Binaries/Linux/PathOfTitansServer-Linux-Shipping

## install end
echo -e "${BLUE}######################################################################################${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                    #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                          ${YELLOW}Installation completed...${BLUE}                                 #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                    #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                   ${RED}(c) Copyright 2024 - GameServersHub.com${BLUE}                          #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                    #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                         ${YELLOW}Path Of Titans Install Script${BLUE}                              #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                         ${YELLOW}Egg by GameServersHub - 411guy${BLUE}                             #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                    #${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}######################################################################################${NC}"
sleep 5

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Sets the name for the server

variables.name: RCON Port
variables.description: This here is your RCON Port For your bots to use!!!

variables.name: Discord Link
variables.description: Add your Discord link for players to connect to your Discord server! ****Only add the end of the link example: (https://discord.gg/gsh) Only add the gsh part!

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: You can leave this blank to remove the need for a server password!

variables.name: Auth Token
variables.description: The AlderonGames Auth Token: Go to https://alderongames.com/oauth/hosting-token to generate one

variables.name: Beta Branch
variables.description: The branch to use for this instance use "production" or "public-test"

variables.name: Database
variables.description: Choose for players save files to be "Local" or "Remote"
